Name: Cyber Drive
About the game: Cyberdrive is: Waves of enemies constantly attacking without giving you a break Average lifespan at easy difficulty 1 minute. Only one thing is required of you 'KILL YOUR ENEMIES !!!!!' 3 different maps. Awesome music. 3 Levels of difficulty: Easy(Hardcore). Normal(Hardcore x2). Hard(The mode was not invented by humans and is not recommended for people). 4 types of weapons. HUGE amount of achievements.
